content.raw:
I'm not sure that this is under the scope of this pull request, but anyway ... I'm seeing in task2 the following messages
```
[ INFO] [1380838057.217541915]: Starting robot with BDI standing
[ INFO] [1380838057.217906431]: Can't find <atlas><robot_description> blocks, defaults to [robot_description].
[ INFO] [1380838057.218013688, 0.001000000]: Can't find <atlas><pose> blocks, defaults to zero transform.
```

gazebo is taking lot of time to render the initial image and when this happens, the robot appears fallen on the ground.

pullrequest.title: Fix drc practice launch files, and models and world for task 6

content.raw:
I just refactored the drc_practice launch files so that the repeated configuration is in drc_practice.launch, and each task will mainly just specify the initial robot position.

I also moved the initial position of atlas forward in task 1, because there's some trimesh collision problems if atlas falls backwards.

I also fixed the vrc_task launch files so atlas starts in bdi_stand mode.
content.html:
I just refactored the drc_practice launch files so that the repeated configuration is in drc_practice.launch, and each task will mainly just specify the initial robot position.

I also moved the initial position of atlas forward in task 1, because there's some trimesh collision problems if atlas falls backwards.

I also fixed the vrc_task launch files so atlas starts in bdi_stand mode.

pullrequest.title: Fix drc practice launch files, and models and world for task 6

content.raw:
Nice, thank you.

Probably you already thought in this one but: would it make sense move the param bdi_stand setup to atlas_no_controllers.launch so we do not have to repeat the same thing in all these (and future) launch files?
content.html:
Nice, thank you.

Probably you already thought in this one but: would it make sense move the param bdi_stand setup to atlas_no_controllers.launch so we do not have to repeat the same thing in all these (and future) launch files?

pullrequest.title: Fix drc practice launch files, and models and world for task 6

content.raw:
I'm not sure where the bdi_stand parameter should be.

I did the drc_practice launch files in a clean way, with the bdi_stand parameter in [drc_practice.launch](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/7f9980986aee5a2a59697766a70ed1bc978efed4/drcsim_gazebo/launch/drc_practice.launch?at=fix_drcpractice_launch#cl-8). I think the vrc_task launch files could benefit from refactoring, but I didn't bother for this pull request.
content.html:
I'm not sure where the bdi_stand parameter should be.

I did the drc_practice launch files in a clean way, with the bdi_stand parameter in drc_practice.launch. I think the vrc_task launch files could benefit from refactoring, but I didn't bother for this pull request.
